TopicTitle: Single stage to Duna orbit and back spaceplane + lander combo [FAR+B9]

Articles.Content:
Javascript is disabled. View full album

This plane is lots of fun. I'm thinking of doing some single-stage to infrastructure stuff with this next.

Edited June 14, 2014 by Parallax

You need to put:

[noparse]

Javascript is disabled. View full album
[/noparse]

to embed the imgur album.

That being said, nice craft!

You embedded the album wrong. It shoud look like this [imgur.]albumID[/imgur.] but without the periods. You can find the album ID in the website address when you view the album on imgur. Edit: Dang got beat to it.
I can barely put a small satellite into orbit with a spaceplane, let alone construct a ship that will fly to Duna and back on one tank of gas! Nicely done!

Mech jeb helps a lot during the design. I group the rockets together into one action group and put them as my first stage. Now I can drain the liquid fuel to simulate my weight when I'm almost about to fire the rockets and see how much dv and TWR I have.
